name: Battle of Seamy Scarp
description:
Developed by Eduard & Catight

Apocalypse is here, our hero has come to the edge of the world.

He wants to rebuild his home, but he has to survive first...

Gather resources, build towers and weapons to destroy your enemies!

W/A/S/D or Right Mouse Button to move.

Left Mouse Button to attack or interact.

F to open doors.

Combine your items in the left-side panel.

Mouse Wheels to switch selected items.Click on food in your inventory to heal.

Click on weapons in your inventory to equip.

Click on towers in your inventory to build.

Click on towers on the map to upgrade or destroy.

Notes:

Not all chickens have eggs

Use your resources wisely, for they are not renewable.
